Entries.DialogueText: Bumped into Robin this morning... she told me you've got a new Slime Hutch!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Bumped into Robin this morning... she told me you've got a new Slime Hutch!

Entries.DialogueText: Not bad!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Not bad!

Entries.DialogueText: I was into slime breeding at your age. It's a great hobby... but dangerous.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I was into slime breeding at your age. It's a great hobby... but dangerous.

Entries.DialogueText: How'd you think I lost this eye?
Entries.DisplayPattern: How'd you think I lost this eye?

Entries.DialogueText: Hah!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hah!

Entries.DialogueText: Just Kidding.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Just Kidding.

Entries.DialogueText: Here, I've got something for you.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Here, I've got something for you.

Entries.DialogueText: It's a slime egg. You can place that inside a slime incubator to hatch it.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's a slime egg. You can place that inside a slime incubator to hatch it.

Entries.DialogueText: Now, take a good hard look at that egg. Next time you're out slime-hunting keep your eyes peeled for more eggs. They're rare, but slimes do drop them from time to time.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Now, take a good hard look at that egg. Next time you're out slime-hunting keep your eyes peeled for more eggs. They're rare, but slimes do drop them from time to time.

Entries.DialogueText: Collect eggs from different slimes to add some variety to your herd!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Collect eggs from different slimes to add some variety to your herd!

Entries.DialogueText: Hmmm...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hmmm...

Entries.DialogueText: ...I was just peering down into this old mine shaft.
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...I was just peering down into this old mine shaft.

Entries.DialogueText: It's been abandoned for decades.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's been abandoned for decades.

Entries.DialogueText: Still, there's probably good ore down there.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Still, there's probably good ore down there.

Entries.DialogueText: But a dark place, undisturbed for so long... I'm afraid ore isn't the only thing you'll find...
Entries.DisplayPattern: But a dark place, undisturbed for so long... I'm afraid ore isn't the only thing you'll find...

Entries.DialogueText: Here, take this. You might need it.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Here, take this. You might need it.

Entries.DialogueText: Name's Marlon, by the way. I run the adventurer's guild right outside.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Name's Marlon, by the way. I run the adventurer's guild right outside.

Entries.DialogueText: I'll keep my eye on you. Prove yourself and I might think about making you a member.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'll keep my eye on you. Prove yourself and I might think about making you a member.

Entries.DialogueText: Clint's blades get sharper every year.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Clint's blades get sharper every year.

Entries.DialogueText: So do his prices...
Entries.DisplayPattern: So do his prices...

Entries.DialogueText: I'm in the market for a new weapon. I wonder if I could negotiate a trade with Clint...
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm in the market for a new weapon. I wonder if I could negotiate a trade with Clint...

Entries.DialogueText: Don't get too close to the cage.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Don't get too close to the cage.

Entries.DialogueText: I caught more monsters this year. Mind your distance near the cages.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I caught more monsters this year. Mind your distance near the cages.

Entries.DialogueText: Even with my bad leg, I never miss a town festival.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Even with my bad leg, I never miss a town festival.

Entries.DialogueText: Have you ever hunted for slime eggs? Now there's a true challenge...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Have you ever hunted for slime eggs? Now there's a true challenge...

Entries.DialogueText: Marnie looks lovely today...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Marnie looks lovely today...

Entries.DialogueText: Hmm. Thought I saw something moving across the water. {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hmm. Thought I saw something moving across the water.

Entries.DialogueText: I'll be back here by the trees... the air is a lot cooler.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'll be back here by the trees... the air is a lot cooler.

Entries.DialogueText: Hello.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hello.

Entries.DialogueText: Soup? Dancing? No thank you. I'm perfectly content right here. Besides, someone needs to keep watch in case a monster appears... {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Soup? Dancing? No thank you. I'm perfectly content right here. Besides, someone needs to keep watch in case a monster appears...

Entries.DialogueText: I may only have one good eye left, but I assure you I will spot any fell creature lurking in the dark.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I may only have one good eye left, but I assure you I will spot any fell creature lurking in the dark.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, good afternoon.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, good afternoon.

Entries.DialogueText: Hmm? Oh, hello. {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hmm? Oh, hello.

Entries.DialogueText: Don't pay any mind to me. Go enjoy yourself.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Don't pay any mind to me. Go enjoy yourself.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, good afternoon.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, good afternoon.

Entries.DialogueText: This time of year isn't so bad. No bugs during winter...
Entries.DisplayPattern: This time of year isn't so bad. No bugs during winter...

Entries.DialogueText: Think you can beat Willy this year? He's a tough competitor...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Think you can beat Willy this year? He's a tough competitor...

Entries.DialogueText: I'm still getting things set up. Why don't you check back later?
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm still getting things set up. Why don't you check back later?

Entries.DialogueText: Hey there, {Farmer_Name}. Welcome to the Adventurer's Guild Challenge Booth.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey there, . Welcome to the Adventurer's Guild Challenge Booth.

Entries.DialogueText: Every day, we'll have a pair of challenges for you to choose from. Complete one, and the guild will reward you with a bounty of Calico Eggs.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Every day, we'll have a pair of challenges for you to choose from. Complete one, and the guild will reward you with a bounty of Calico Eggs.

Entries.DialogueText: Once you've selected a challenge, you won't be able to change your decision, so choose carefully!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Once you've selected a challenge, you won't be able to change your decision, so choose carefully!

Entries.DialogueText: Looking to test your mettle, huh?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Looking to test your mettle, huh?

Entries.DialogueText: I've got a few challenges that might do just that.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I've got a few challenges that might do just that.

Entries.DialogueText: Feeling the adventurer's spirit?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Feeling the adventurer's spirit?

Entries.DialogueText: Good, here are today's challenges.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Good, here are today's challenges.

Entries.DialogueText: I hope you've kept your weapons maintained.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I hope you've kept your weapons maintained.

Entries.DialogueText: You'll need them in top form for today's challenges.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You'll need them in top form for today's challenges.

Entries.DialogueText: I can see a bold look in your eye.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I can see a bold look in your eye.

Entries.DialogueText: How about a challenge?
Entries.DisplayPattern: How about a challenge?

Entries.DialogueText: Still working on the challenge, huh?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Still working on the challenge, huh?

Entries.DialogueText: Well, here it is, in case you needed a reminder.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well, here it is, in case you needed a reminder.

Entries.DialogueText: Very good.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Very good.

Entries.DialogueText: There'll be more challenges tomorrow, so take it easy and get some rest.
Entries.DisplayPattern: There'll be more challenges tomorrow, so take it easy and get some rest.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, you did it! I'm impressed.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, you did it! I'm impressed.

Entries.DialogueText: That's it for this year, but Gil and I will be here again next time around.
Entries.DisplayPattern: That's it for this year, but Gil and I will be here again next time around.

Entries.DialogueText: He's back!
Entries.DisplayPattern: He's back!

Entries.DialogueText: She's back!
Entries.DisplayPattern: She's back!

Entries.DialogueText: Need a new sword?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Need a new sword?

Entries.DialogueText: Greetings.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Greetings.

Entries.DialogueText: Gil, wake up! We have a visitor.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Gil, wake up! We have a visitor.

Entries.DialogueText: Good evening.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Good evening.
